workshopData.contentHtml:
The workshop will be held as part of EMNLP in December, 2022. It is endorsed by the ACL Special Interest Group on Natural Language Generation (SIGGEN).

Please check here soon for our call for papers. If you are interested in seeing last year's workshop website from ACL 2021, please check here.
workshopData.title: GEM Workshop at EMNLP 2022
